LightningComponentBundle.description: Personalized and localized welcome user message

property.name: greeting
property.label: Default Greeting
property.description: Greeting text. Use '{0}' as the placeholder for the user's first name.

property.name: greetingMorning
property.label: Greeting (Morning)
property.description: Greeting the user see in the morning (12:01am - noon). Leave blank to use default greeting. Use '{0}' as the placeholder for the user's first name.

property.name: greetingAfternoon
property.label: Greeting (Afternoon)
property.description: Greeting the user see in the afternoon (noon - 6pm). Leave blank to use default greeting. Use '{0}' as the placeholder for the user's first name.

property.name: greetingEvening
property.label: Greeting (Evening)
property.description: Greeting the user see in the evening (6pm - midnight). Leave blank to use default greeting. Use '{0}' as the placeholder for the user's first name.

property.name: useCommunityNickname
property.label: Use nickname
property.description: Use Community Nickname if it exists.

property.name: showAccountName
property.label: Display Account Name
property.description: Displays the Account Name associated with the user in parenthesis after the user's name

property.name: guestGreeting
property.label: Guest Greeting Text
property.description: If no first name is available for the user, or the user is a guest user, this headline will display.

property.name: welcomeText
property.label: Welcome Text
property.description: Text entered here will display on the second line

property.name: customClass
property.label: CSS Class
property.description: Apply additional SLDS or custom CSS class
